statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_reports;
SELECT company_name, waste_category, waste_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_reports;
SELECT report_id, company_name, report_date FROM biodegradable_waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Food Waste';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(waste_quantity) AS total_waste_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_reports GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, waste_quantity ASC
SELECT company_name, waste_category FROM biodegradable_waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Food Waste'
SELECT AVG(waste_quantity) as average_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT company_name, SUM(waste_quantity) as total_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_reports GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Plastic Waste' ORDER BY report_date
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance
SELECT id, report_date FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT source_name, waste_type FROM waste_sources WHERE compliance_level = TRUE
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE total_waste_weight > 1000
SELECT id, compliance_status FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status=true ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT id, total_waste_weight FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE total_waste_weight > 1000 ORDER BY total_waste_weight ASC
SELECT source_name, waste_type FROM waste_sources WHERE compliance_level=true ORDER BY source_name
SELECT id, total_waste_weight, report_date FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status=false AND total_waste_weight BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC

SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance JOIN waste_sources ON biodegradable_waste_compliance.id = waste_sources.source_id WHERE compliance_level=true ORDER BY biodegradable_waste_compliance.report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteReports;
SELECT report_id, compliance_level FROM BiodegradableWasteReports WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT company_name, location FROM WasteManagementCompanies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE organization='ABC Company';
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, organization FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE description LIKE '%environmental%';
SELECT report_date, compliance_level, compliance_score FROM BiodegradableWasteReports;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementCompanies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT company_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM WasteManagementCompanies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT standard_name, organization FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE standard_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteReports WHERE compliance_score > 80 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste;
SELECT waste_type, date_collected FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT manager_name, location, capacity FROM waste_collection_sites ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT site_id, collection_date, collected_by FROM waste_collection_records WHERE waste_weight > 1000;
SELECT report_date, compliance_rating, comments FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY date_collected DESC
SELECT waste_type, weight FROM biodegradable_waste WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight DESC

SELECT biodegradable_waste.*, waste_collection_sites.location FROM biodegradable_waste JOIN waste_collection_sites ON biodegradable_waste.id = waste_collection_sites.site_id WHERE waste_collection_sites.manager_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(weight) FROM biodegradable_waste GROUP BY waste_type HAVING AVG(weight) > 50
SELECT wcs.location, COUNT(*) FROM waste_collection_sites wcs JOIN waste_collection_records wcr ON wcs.site_id = wcr.site_id GROUP BY wcs.location HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance;
SELECT report_id, company_name, compliance_date FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE LENGTH(regulation_description) > 50;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_site_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance;
SELECT report_id, waste_quantity, collection_date FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_description LIKE '%environment%';

SELECT biodegradable_waste_compliance.company_name, regulations.regulation_name FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance, compliance_history, regulations WHERE biodegradable_waste_compliance.report_id = compliance_history.report_id AND compliance_history.regulation_id = regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT disposal_site_id, site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
